---
title: "cfa cors"
output: pdf_document
---
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F, message=F, warning=F)
options(knitr.table.format = "latex")
library(here)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```



```{r, results="asis", eval=T}
setwd(here("functions"))
source("cfa USA sumscore cors.R")


o <-create.sumscore.cor("o")
c <-create.sumscore.cor("c")
e <-create.sumscore.cor("e")
a <-create.sumscore.cor("a")
n <-create.sumscore.cor("n")

kable(round(cor(o), 3), "latex", booktabs = T)%>% 
  kable_styling(latex_options = "scale_down")
kable(round(cor(c), 3), "latex", booktabs = T)%>% 
  kable_styling(latex_options = "scale_down")
kable(round(cor(e), 3), "latex", booktabs = T)%>% 
  kable_styling(latex_options = "scale_down")
kable(round(cor(a), 3), "latex", booktabs = T)%>% 
  kable_styling(latex_options = "scale_down")
kable(round(cor(n), 3), "latex", booktabs = T)%>% 
  kable_styling(latex_options = "scale_down")


```
